name: Drop-in: A Place to Play
description: Bring your tots to Glen Park Rec Center as we turn our gymnasium into an indoor playground! Recommended for children 4 and under.
fullDescription: Bring your tots to Glen Park Rec Center as we turn our gymnasium into an indoor playground! Recommended for children 4 and under.
whatTheyOffer: Bring your tots to Glen Park Rec Center as we turn our gymnasium into an indoor playground! Recommended for children 4 and under.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
